text: Venkata Satish Kilaru (born 18 May) is an Indian film producer and entrepreneur who works primarily in Telugu cinema. He made his debut with the film Peddi starring Ram Charan. == Career == Satish is an Indian businessman from Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh. He is the owner of Vriddhi Infratech, a company in the infrastructure sector. In 2024, he founded the film production company Vriddhi Cinemas LLP and produced the debut film Peddi, starring Ram Charan.https://www.indiaglitz.com/ram-charan-and-rc16-producer-celebrates- buchi-babu-sanas-birthday--news-362122 == Filmography == Year Film Director Notes Ref. 2026 Buchi Babu Sana Debut film Gopichand Malineni Announced == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:Indian movie producers Category:Indian businesspeople Category:People from Telangana
title: Venkata Satish Kilaru
